newsitem.title: USA: FOCUS - API crude imports seen weighing on market.
newsitem.headline: FOCUS - API crude imports seen weighing on market.

text.p: The American Petroleum Institute's (API) weekly inventory report showed a sharp rise in refinery on the Gulf Coast use but also increased crude imports, a combination which might pressure crude further, analysts said Tuesday.

As refiners along the heavily concentrated "refinery row" in the Gulf Coast (PADD III) area emerged from seasonal maintenance, they drew down 1.2 million barrels of crude last week, erasing building stocks in the Midwest region.
